citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The licensee is missing the documentation of a complete species-appropriate environmental enhancement plan that is
required for birds. There are domestic chickens, ducks, turkeys, geese, peafowl and Guinea fowl on the property. They
are already providing adequate social grouping and some enrichment to the birds including substrate to scratch in,
outdoor access and ample human interaction, but they lack a written plan approved by the attending veterinarian. The
plan, at a minimum, must address social grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint devices,
and exemptions as described in 3.154. A species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement is necessary to
promote the psychological well-being of the birds on the premises.
***Correct by: November 17th, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n
